magicwan.common.parent.page.title: Magic WAN
onramp.listpage.title: Cloud on-ramps
onramp.listpage.description: Create on-ramps to connect your virtual cloud networks to Magic WAN.
onramp.listpage.need_user_attention: You have %{ramps} on-ramp that needs reviewed.
onramp.listpage.table.title: Your network on-ramps
onramp.listpage.table.description: Monitor the status and attached resources of your cloud network on-ramps.
onramp.listpage.table.column.name: Name
onramp.emptylist_page.title: Connect your virtual cloud networks to Magic WAN
onramp.emptylist_page.description: Integrate your third-party cloud networks and resources with MagicWAN.
onramp.emptylist_page.section1.title: Integrate your cloud networks
onramp.emptylist_page.section1.text1: Cloudflare currently supports integrations with AWS and Azure.
onramp.emptylist_page.section1.text2: Authorize your credentials so Cloudflare can discover and manage resources.
onramp.emptylist_page.section2.title: Add on-ramps to connect your resources
onramp.emptylist_page.section2.text1: Assign where Cloudflare should build new routes.
onramp.emptylist_page.section2.text2: Review and deploy your new on-ramp.
onramp.detail.properties.name: Name
onramp.detail.activation.title: Planning on-ramp
onramp.detail.activation.description: This on-ramp needs to be activated
onramp.detail.activation.description.v2: Please review pending resource discovery changes to your on-ramp.
onramp.detail.activation.note: There are no errors. Please click review and deploy to setup connectivity.
onramp.detail.activation.error_note: There are errors. Please fix the errors and then click review and deploy.
onramp.create.wizard_page.title: New cloud network on-ramp
onramp.create.wizard_page.subtitle: Connect your cloud network to Magic WAN
onramp.create.wizard_page.namepage.title: Name your on-ramp
onramp.create.wizard_page.vpcpage.title: Select cloud networks
onramp.create.wizard_page.namepage.descr: This is how Cloudflare will reference your on-ramp.
onramp.create.wizard_page.cloudpage.desc: Select the type of cloud you are using for this network. Depending on your cloud type, you may need to select an associated integration and region. To add an integration not listed here, visit Cloud Integrations.
onramp.create.wizard_page.vpcpage.descri: Select the network you want to connect. To add a network not listed here, go to Cloud Integrations.
onramp.create.wizard_page.propertypage.d: Control where Cloudflare will install routes.
onramp.create.wizard_page.activationpage: This on-ramp will create or modify the following resources in your cloud environment. Review and approve to create the on-ramp.
onramp.create.wizard_page.summarypage.de: Review the details of your new connection. On-ramp creation can take up to an hour.
onramp.create.wizard_page.cloudpage.fiel: Select the cloud you intend to use for this network.
onramp.create.wizard_page.summarypage.ne: View newly created on-ramps or review existing on-ramps and their statuses.
onramp.property.route-propagations_to_yo: Add routes for your Magic WAN address space to your cloud network
To configure Magic WAN address space, click <0>here</0>.
Add routes for your cloud network to Magic WAN
By default, this only installs routes to private address space. To install a default route, read <0>here</0>.
onramp.selectedVPCList.component.title: Selected networks: %{total}
onramp.delete_popup.confirm: Are you sure you want to destroy %{name}
onramp.detach_popup.confirm: Are you sure you want to detach %{name}
onramp.delete_popup.summary: Your on-ramp will be deleted and all connections will be destroyed.
onramp.detach_popup.summary: You will no longer be able to view or make changes to your on-ramp, but connectivity (including cloud resources created by Cloudflare) will be left in place.
onramp.associated_resources.title: Associated Resources
This is your current on-ramp discovery resource
onramp.associated_resources.detail: There are (%{total}) resources currently affected by this on-ramp
onramp.edit_page.title: Edit %{name}
onramp.edit_page.description: Make changes to your on-ramp details or configuration.
onramp.edit_page.tab.basic_info.title: Basic information
onramp.edit_page.tab.configuration.title: Configurations
onramp.edit_page.tab.basic_info.descript: Please provide name and Description for on-ramp
onramp.edit_page.tab.basic_info.note: Note: you cannot change the cloud network at this time
onramp.edit_page.tab.configuration.note: Note: You have made changes to your configurations. You will need to redeploy your on-ramp.
onramp.activation_page.preparing: Preparing list of resources which need to be deployed. This may take about a minute or so.
onramp.activation_page.error.title: Please fix the following errors and prepare plan again
onramp.activation_page.error.note: Note: Preparing list of affected resources may take more than 60 minutes. Please press 'Re-plan' and wait for the resource list to be populated.
onramp.activation_page.success.note: Note: Deployment may take up to 120 minutes.
onramp.pending_resource.title: Pending Associated Resources
onramp.pending_resource.detail: There are (%{total}) resources currently affected by this on-ramp. Activate your on-ramp when ready.
onramp.pending_resource.name: Name
onramp.pending_resources.column.name: Name
onramp.listpage.banner.content: You have %{count} on-ramp(s) that need to be reviewed.

onramp.planning.initiated_at: You initiated an on-ramp planning at %{time} on %{date}.
